image.alt: We are proud to be celebrating 10 years with Justia Mexico!

columns.blockSubtitle: We are proud to be celebrating 10 years with Justia Mexico!
description: The Justia Mexico team has grown over the past decade and our team members moved into a new office space to celebrate the 10th anniversary. CEO Tim Stanley was there for the ribbon-cutting official opening!
Our CEO celebrated his birthday last month and while visiting our Mexico office, he enjoyed a fun birthday tradition there... Ana did the honors of his cake in the face!
